full_title: OKS Roll-Type Cleaning Cloths Roll, 30-Pack of Pink & White 35cm x 25cm Kitchen Towels, 100% Viscose Rayon Non-Woven Cloths for Kitchen Cleaning and Dusting

reasoning.keyword_integration: Integrated top keywords 'kitchen towel', 'cleaning cloth', 'cleaning supplies', and 'kitchen cloth' by weaving them into natural phrases.
